name: Back to my bones
description:
You're a lonely skull on a deserted island, find your body to be whole again!

- Move with AD ☠️

- Grab stuff with your mouth E ☠️

- Shoot your head with your torso SPACE ☠️

- Collect body parts and don't touch the sabers!!! ☠️

Programming & Game Design - Jaime Ruiznavarro   

Programming  -  Latmanstand

Art and Animation - Nestiboy99

(Having problems with Browser format, please download the game, sorry)

(Audio borrowed from FreeSound)
